Interface ILightListener


  • public interface ILightListener
    Listens for state changes of lights.
    Author:
    Curdin Banzer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(int errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Is called, when the execution of a command has failed.
      void onStateUpdate(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> successMessage, java.util.List<com.philips.lighting.model.PHHueError> errorMessage)
      Is called, when a state changed happened.
      void onSuccess()
      Is called, when a command was executed successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        Is called, when a command was executed successfully.

      • onStateUpdate

        void onStateUpdate(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> successMessage,
                 java.util.List<com.philips.lighting.model.PHHueError> errorMessage)
        Is called, when a state changed happened.
        Parameters:
        successMessage - Message, if the change was successful.
        errorMessage - Message, if the change failed.

      • onError

        Is called, when the execution of a command has failed.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The error code (see philips hue sdk).
        errorMessage - The error message.
